name: Quest Lands
description:
Explore the lands of Polytasia and defeat the titan bosses in this deck-building card game with tactical map and rogue-like elements.

Battle legendary monsters, explore strange lands, build your deck, and claim epic loot.

Features:

  • Don't just hoard cards. Make smart choices. Level up or discard weak cards.
  • Discover powerful synergies between different cards and exploit your opponent's weaknesses.
  • Discover shops, shrines, observatories, smithies, sanctuaries and other unique locations.
  • Equip dozens of items, including swords, shields, axes, armor, and slingshots.
  • Slay ferocious monsters and unique bosses in epic battles.
  • Unlock new heroes and cards across multiple play-throughs.
  • 160+ cards (growing) for you to discover and build decks.
  • Retro low poly art style!
  • Quest Lands is an homage to Dream Quest by Peter Whalen and strives to bring the feel of the original to a wider audience.
